nse_queries.observation: On page no. 147, it is mentioned the disclosure regarding unnamed foreign entities. The Company mentions foreign business partner(s) without providing complete names and details. Kindly provide: (a) complete name and registration details of such entity; (b) nature and terms of business arrangement; (c) dependency analysis and alternate arrangements, if any. Provide revised draft along with confirmation that the same shall be updated in prospectus.

In “Our Business” chapter- It is observed that the Company has made use of superlative words / adjectives like “Experienced”, “comprehensive”, “experienced”, “extensive”, “high-quality”, “leader”, “significant”, “superior”, “trusted” etc. without citing the source and basis of the same as per the instructions mentioned in Schedule VI of the SEBI (ICDR) Regulations 2018 in relation to forward-looking statements. Kindly provide the source/basis of all such statements/claims. Also include these bases in the Material Documents Chapter available for inspection. If not, kindly review and revise the same. Further, the above mentioned points are merely indicative in nature, the Merchant banker shall vet the offer document and ensure that there are no disclosures which are advertising statements and marketing statement and if there are any it shall be either be drafted in a neutral language or provide a basis for the same or removed, to that end, kindly provide a draft along with a confirmation the same shall be placed at the time of prospectus as applicable

[Critical - Operational] Throughout the Chapter (specifically on Page 132), the disclosure states "Our products have been approved and accepted by Indian Government testing agencies such as ARAI, VRDE, ICAT, CIRT, and by all State RTOs for major makes and models of petrol cars and three-wheelers (auto rickshaws), in compliance with BS-I, BS-II, BS-III, and BS-IV norms, and are also OBD-II compliant." However, the provided table detailing expenses for vehicle testing for BS VI emission norms does not explicitly state the actual inspection/rejection rates for these vehicles post-testing. This lack of QA performance data, specifically rejection rates, prevents a full assessment of the effectiveness of the testing process and its impact on operational efficiency. Provide revised draft...
On page no. 131, it is mentioned R&D/product development. Provide revised draft. Please explain the reason for the observed >20% YoY change in revenue for Automotive Products (FYn → FYn+1).

On page no. 131, it is mentioned specialized equipment. Kindly elaborate and explain the statement 'Custom Machinery for International Clients'. Clarify the CAPEX and timeline for the same. Provide revised draft.

[Critical - Operational] On Page 150, under "PLANT AND MACHINERY DETAILS," the disclosure lists various equipment. While some items like "Aluminum Mold for the CNG Kit Box," "Roller Bench System," "Fiber Laser Marking Machines," and "Multiple Gas Analyzers" are specific, others such as "Barcode Scanners," "Barcode Printers," and "Air Conditioners" are generic. Furthermore, the application for "Barcode Printers" is described as "Efficient labeling and inventory management," which is a broad statement. To ensure a comprehensive understanding of the operational infrastructure, please specify the make, model, and key technical specifications for all listed equipment, particularly those with generic descriptions, and elaborate on the specific functions and benefits of the barcode printing system in the context of manufacturing and quality control. Provide revised draft...

[Critical - Operational] Throughout the Chapter (specifically on Page 145), the disclosure mentions "Assembled kits are distributed to authorized distributors and dealers, who, in turn, supply the kits to Retro fitment Centres (RFCs) for vehicle installations." It also states "Our company sources empty cylinders from a network of trusted suppliers. Upon procurement, these cylinders are systematically stored in our secure warehouses, where they undergo thorough quality checks... Once cleared, the cylinders are dispatched to our authorized dealers, who oversee their installation in vehicles and facilitate the necessary gas refilling process." Clarify the exact role of "Eco fuel" in the assembly, distribution, and installation of these kits and cylinders, and the specific responsibilities of the "authorized distributors and dealers" and "Retro fitment Centres (RFCs)" in relation to the company's direct operations. Provide revised draft...
Please confirm whether audited financial statements for the last 3 FYs are included and provide reference pages.

On page no. 20, dependency is mentioned: 'based on the import invoices to ensure
            the safety and protection of goods during transit'. Kindly disclose: (a) % of revenue/operations dependent on this factor; (b) historical instances of disruption (if any) and quantified impact; (c) mitigation measures with timeline and cost; and (d) a specific Risk Factor. Provide revised draft.
On page no. 1, acronym(s) 'CAGR, US' appear without definition. Kindly provide full form on first occurrence or in glossary/abbreviations section. Provide revised draft.
On page no. 2, acronym(s) 'GAAP' appear without definition. Kindly provide full form on first occurrence or in glossary/abbreviations section. Provide revised draft.
On page no. 5, acronym(s) 'OEM' appear without definition. Kindly provide full form on first occurrence or in glossary/abbreviations section. Provide revised draft.
On page no. 20, acronym(s) 'ICICI' appear without definition. Kindly provide full form on first occurrence or in glossary/abbreviations section. Provide revised draft.
On page no. 22, acronym(s) 'ST' appear without definition. Kindly provide full form on first occurrence or in glossary/abbreviations section. Provide revised draft.

Kindly provide product-wise domestic and export sales bifurcation for the DRHP period. Include detailed breakup for all major products (Automotive Products, etc.) in tabular format showing ₹ and % contribution.

Refer to financial section of the DRHP and provide/include details of breakup of industry-wise revenue from operations split for the DRHP period (e.g., Automotive, Appliances, Industrial, etc.). Provide this in tabular format showing ₹ and % contribution for past 3 FYs and stub period.
Incorporate the details of country wise import purchases value and % terms for the DRHP period. Provide revised draft.
Refer page 168 include the row of total in all tables. Ensure all financial tables throughout the DRHP include a 'Total' row/column for arithmetic accuracy.

Refer page 4, kindly check for inclusion of details of R&D and branding investment/expenditure done in DRHP period. Include: (a) number of employees in R&D department; (b) ₹ spent in past 3 FYs; (c) key outcomes/patents filed; and (d) future R&D plans. Provide revised draft.

Kindly check for inclusion of details of major verticals/products split into own manufacturing and contractual manufacturing. Provide ₹ and % split for each major product line (Automotive Products, etc.) for past 3 FYs and stub period. Include: (a) capacity utilization for own manufacturing; (b) contract manufacturer names and locations; and (c) quality control mechanisms. Provide revised draft.

Refer to the trademark details in business chapter, kindly include the registration number, registration date, and validity period details for all trademarks in the DRHP. Provide this in tabular format showing: (a) Trademark name; (b) Class; (c) Registration No.; (d) Registration date; (e) Validity till; and (f) Territory. Provide revised draft.

Refer to the property section on page 21, kindly include the area details (i.e. sq.ft., sq. meters, acres etc.) for all properties (owned and leased). Provide this in the property table along with: (a) built-up area; (b) land area; (c) unit of measurement; and (d) usage (manufacturing/office/warehouse). Provide revised draft.

Refer to manufacturing process details, include the details of scrap and wastages details. Quantify the scrap generation %, wastage %, and yield loss analysis for the past 3 FYs. Provide the draft and incorporate the same in DRHP.

The DRHP mentions exclusive arrangements (e.g., with Lovato/Landi Renzo). Kindly provide a copy of the exclusive agreement(s). Explicitly disclose: (a) the Territory Scope of exclusivity; (b) Validity period; (c) Termination clauses; and (d) any targets/minimum purchase obligations. If no written agreement exists, delete the claim. Provide revised draft.

Kindly provide details on the decline/trend in customer count over the last 3 years. Explicitly disclose the 'Repeat Clientele %' (revenue from existing customers vs new customers). Explain specific reasons for any loss of customers. Provide revised draft.

Kindly reconcile the import procurement tables provided across different pages (e.g., Business vs MD&A). Ensure country-wise and product-wise import data matches exactly. Explain any variance. Provide revised draft.

Kindly provide the installed capacity vs workforce metrics for Retrofitment Centres (RFCs). Clarify if the current workforce is adequate for the stated capacity. Provide capacity utilization of RFCs specifically (Maharashtra etc.). Provide revised draft.
Kindly disclose the nature and duration of OEM collaborations mentioned. Are these one-off PO based or long-term contracts? Provide details of any MOUs/Agreements. Provide revised draft.

Kindly reconcile the domestic vs import classification for Landi Renzo SpA. Confirm if purchases from Landi Renzo are classified as imports or domestic (via indian subsidiary). Ensure consistency across all tables. Provide revised draft.

Regarding agreements (e.g. lease, purchase, sales), confirm they are not prejudicial to the interest of the Issuer. Explicitly confirm they are at arm's length. If any agreement is not at arm's length, disclose the justification and Audit Committee approval. Provide revised draft.

Kindly disclose the detailed logistics mechanism followed by the Company. Explain the flow of goods from Factory -> Depot/Warehouse -> Dealer/Distributor -> Retailer. Clarify who bears the freight/transportation risk at each leg (Company or Customer). Provide revised draft.

Kindly include a detailed business process flowchart covering the entire value chain from Raw Material Procurement to Finished Goods Dispatch. Ensure key control points and quality checks are highlighted in the flowchart. Provide revised draft.

Kindly provide the Attrition Rate (%) for the last 3 financial years, split between Senior Management and Junior Staff/Workers. Also confirm whether the Company is fully compliant with EPF and ESIC payments for all eligible employees (including contract labour). Provide revised draft.

Kindly provide a table showing total insurance cover vis-a-vis total value of assets (Property, Plant & Equipment + Inventory). Quantify the % of assets covered implies adequacy. Disclose details of any insurance claims rejected in the last 3 years. Provide revised draft.

Kindly provide details of CSR obligations vs actual CSR spend for the last 3 financial years. Confirm if the Company meets the 2% average net profit criteria. If there is any shortfall/unspent amount, provide reasons and details of transfer to specified funds. Provide revised draft.

Kindly format the revenue disclosure to explicitly show 'State-wise Revenue Bifurcation' for top 10 states for the last 3 financial years. Ensure this reconciles with GST returns data. Provide revised draft.
